import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // Redux import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' // Bootstrap Components import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form, Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Accordion } from "react-bootstrap"; // Components import Rating from '../components/Rating' // Redux Actions import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1); const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; const baseUrl = process.env.REACT_APP_API__BASE_URL; // console.log("product", product); useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } // Handler that logs in the user const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // console.log("postalCode", postalCode); // Check if passwords are the same // if (postalCode !== confirmPassword) { // setMessage('Passwords do not match') // } else { // // Dispatch update profile reducer // dispatch(updateUserProfile({ id: user._id, name, email, phone, password })) // } } return ( <> Go Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( <> {product.name == "Pink Desire" ? : } {product.name == "Pink Desire" ? : } {product.name == "Pink Desire" ? : } {/* {product?.images[0] !== undefined && ( product?.images.map((dara) => ( )) )} */}

*/} Price: ₹{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value) } > {[ ...Array( product.countInStock ).keys(), ].map((p) => ( ))} )}
